name: Fruit Garden Blast
description:
With particularly well-designed challenging puzzle levels and colorful graphics, you may never get bored in this fruits garden paradise. Complete different goals to pass the level, you will enjoy making the maximum swap for the best fruit blast.

☆☆☆☆☆ Game Features ☆☆☆☆☆
• Amazing 240 levels of fruit match and mouthwatering puzzles
• Gather various fruits to win fruity levels before you run out of moves
• Collect droplets and sunflowers for tough levels
• Create and use powerful boosters in this fruitful land
• Unlock more levels and adventures with your achievements.
• Small game size but super amazing effects

Let's take on this joy alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest scores!
